text: Our second group of dreamers are a family, the Zaps.
In 2000, childhood sweethearts, Herman and Candelaria Zap bought a vintage car and set off from Argentina to travel around the world with less than $3,500 in their pockets.
22 years and three children later, they have visited over a hundred countries, meeting with countless people and experiences on the way.
